title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Season 10, Vol. 2: I Wish
description: Buffy and her crew get their fight on against the new vampires and take a trip to Sunnydale, where Andrew is up to his good/bad/old tricks again. And everyone is tempted by what the new rules of magic can do for them . . . just like the Big Bads who have come knocking on Buffy’s door! Collects Buffy Season 10 #6–#10.
author: Christos Gage
